name: Magnet Helper
description: Adds a button to magnet links to send them to qBittorrent.

permissions_reasons.storage: 保存用户配置和下载历史记录
permissions_reasons.activeTab: 在当前标签页中检测和处理磁力链接
permissions_reasons.scripting: 注入内容脚本以添加下载按钮
permissions_reasons.notifications: 显示下载状态和错误信息

host_permissions_reasons.<all_urls>: 在任何网站上检测磁力链接并添加下载按钮
